markdownRemark.html:
Bird, Limes, bah! How hard can it be to create a scooter share? ğŸ˜

The idea behind Creatures is to see what it takes to start up a company, document the process, and open source as much as possible; in effect a business model as an open source project.

My intention is not to necessarily start up a successful company, rather it is to experiment, learn a lot, and hopefully have a bit fun.

Goals

  • Learn

    • Starting a Business / LLC
    • AWS - Amazon Web Services
    • IOT - Internet of Things
    • Serverless
    • Gatsby
    • Supporting Charity

  • Automate

    • Bulk of project automated - infrastructure as code

  • Document & Share

    • Project Blog
    • Create How to Guide, with corresponding git repo

  • Low Cost

    • Keep costs low
    • Raise money for charity

Easy peasyâ€¦
